metadata.title: CVE-2021-36493 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in pdfimages in xpdf 4.03 allows attackers to crash the application via crafted command.

notes.note: ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
